title: Don't Touch My Mobile

creator: SO LAB
descriptionHtml:
Don't touch my mobile phone
Don't Touch My Mobile Phone is the anti-theft, phone security alarm app. It can detect motion whenever someone attempts to touch or detach the charging cable from your phone.

The application has 5 modes available.
Don't touch my phone mode
Pocket mode
WiFi mode
Handsfree mode
Charging mode

To activate any mode simply open it you see Activate button for each mode inside its own activity. Setting for each mode is available, you can select the different volumes, different Alarm tunes for each mode separately. Don't touch my phone mode will help you when some touch your mobile phone it will start an alarm, the second mode Pocket mode work same but in pocket mode mobile start alarm with the low motion. WiFi mode work when you connect or disconnect the WiFi it will alarm once only. Handsfree mode work when you plug in or plug out the Handsfree it will alarm once only but remember when Handsfree is a plugin it will use handsfree for alarm. Charging mode work when someone plugs in or plugs out the Charging cable it will alarm once."

Don't Touch My Mobile Phone secure your phone full of useful data against crooks and burglary using this anti-theft security and theft protection app known as don't touch my Mobile. If you are worried about your phone and your personal data then no need to worry about your phone's protection anymore because we made dont touch my phone app. dont touch my cellphone use your phone sensor and have many alarm tones. so everyone should use dont touch my mobile app. In other words, don't touch my Mobile anti-theft protection is very helpful for you.


Don't Touch My Mobile Phone put your phone on a flat surface and press the activate. This anti touching phone app is the best answer against crooks touching my phone by triggering the alarm anti furto tones. Anti-theft security will trigga the security alarm with a built-in anti theft app feature. don't touch my smartphone have also other functions such as phone mobile alarm on touching the phone with anti theft alarm and phone theft security. This app does not touch my phone works as a security phone with anti theft security options. phone anti-theft works in a simple way against theft protection.

Don't Touch My smartphone uses the mobile phone sensor for theft detection purposes and thief catcher purposes. don't touch my cellphone anti theft alarm works in a very simple way and will provide security and anti-theft security. works as phone thief catcher and mobile safety alarm with a mobile anti theft security system with trigga alarm. don't touch my smartphone is the best security phone app. This security phone app and anti-theft security are specially made to use against crooks and burglary and phones.
Don't touch my mobile phone or Don't touch my smartphone.
descriptionShort: Don't Touch My Mobile alarm protect your privacy and data
